overview: Follow the story of seven individuals whoâ€™s lives were changed forever, not only by the horrific day of September 11, but by the stunning symbol of hope they found buried beneath the rubble of ground zero. Witness through first hand accounts this stunning story of hope, a story that has never been told.
tagline: 9/11 - A day that will never be forgotten. "In the midst of devastation, hope will rise."
title: The Cross and the Towers
